channel.title: The Show Weekly
channel.description: A weekly show done by two wacky brothers somewhere in the vicinity of the United States. In the 22nd Dimension.

item.title: Episode First
item.description: The first episode of The Show Weekly, in which the nature of checkers is discussed and the magic of radio is spoiled. Length: 32:04. File Size: 29.3 MB.

item.title: Episode Second
item.description: The episode in which Black takes the wheel, and much singing and crying ensues. Cannibalism is also discussed at width. Length: 33:13. File Size: 31.1 MB.

item.title: Episode Third
item.description: In which laughing gas is distributed amongst the hosts, Recluse gets frustrated, and the dictionary is used as a form of literary entertainment. Length: 32:07. File Size: 30.1 MB.

item.title: Episode Fourth
item.description: In which Black gets locked in the closet with an imaginary article of furniture, and in which Latteman makes his debut. Length: 31:02. File Size: 29.1 MB.

item.title: Episode Fifth
item.description: In which the dynamic duo are ambushed and are not able to release their episode in time! The day is saved by Political Analyst Zach Graves, who guest stars in his very first radio debut! Length: 29:10. File Size: 27.3 MB.
